name: Peer-to-Peer Transfer
description: Money sent directly to individuals, friends, or family through bank transfer, P2P apps, or remittance services.

name: Business Payment
description: Payments made to businesses or merchants for goods and services, excluding subscriptions and utilities.

name: Subscriptions
description: Recurring payments to digital services like music, video streaming, SaaS tools, or online memberships.

name: Entertainment & Leisure
description: Expenses for movies, games, events, nightlife, or recreational activities.

name: Mobile & Internet
description: Payments for mobile top-ups, internet data, broadband, or telecom services.

name: Utilities
description: Payments for electricity, water, gas, or similar household services.

name: Groceries
description: Purchases from supermarkets, convenience stores, or grocery delivery apps.

name: Retail & E-commerce
description: Purchases from physical or online retail stores (clothing, electronics, general shopping).

name: Dining & Food Delivery
description: Restaurant payments, caf√©s, takeaways, or online food delivery services.

name: Transport
description: Expenses on taxis, ride-hailing apps, buses, trains, or other local commuting.

name: Fuel & Auto
description: Spending on fuel, car maintenance, parking, or tolls.

name: Travel
description: Flights, hotels, travel agencies, or vacation-related expenses.

name: Bank Charges
description: Service fees, maintenance charges, ATM fees, or other bank-related deductions.

name: Currency Conversion
description: Debits from converting funds between currencies (FX transactions).

name: Salary & Wages
description: Credits from salary, wages, or contract payments.

name: Refunds & Reimbursements
description: Credits from refunds, cashback, or business reimbursements.

name: Healthcare
description: Payments for hospitals, pharmacies, medical bills, or insurance.

name: Education
description: Tuition fees, online courses, learning materials, or academic services.

name: Charity & Donations
description: Payments to charities, NGOs, religious contributions, or crowdfunding.

name: Cash Withdrawal
description: ATM withdrawals or cash taken directly from bank branches.

name: Uncategorized
description: Transactions that do not fit into any predefined category or require manual review.
